entry.name: Bastion Host Web to DB
entry.description: Enable this policy to permit a bastion Web host to reach the DB network instances

value.member:
Notice

To access the network, you must first connect to GlobalProtect.

Captive Portal Detected

GlobalProtect has temporarily permitted network access for you to connect to the Internet. Follow instructions from your internet provider.

If you let the connection time out, open GlobalProtect and click Connect to try again.
You have attempted to access a protected resource that requires additional authentication. Proceed to authenticate at

match-message.message: You have a Windows 7 machine with Traps installed.

not-match-message.message: You don't have a Windows 10 machine with Traps installed. Boo

match-message.message: You've got a Mac, you must know what you're doing.
